author: pbs.org
title: PBS NewsHour full episode October 23, 2015 PBS NewsHour
text: Friday on the NewsHour, Hurricane Patricia, a storm of the ages, hits the western coast of Mexico. Also: Secretary of State John Kerry and other world leaders seek a solution for the conflict in Syria, new wind turbines could become a life saver for golden eagles, David Brooks and Mark Shields discuss the week’s news and what has become of Newark’s previously failing school system.
